attributes.action: Replace the memorial to Guy Gibson's dog
attributes.additional_details: I and many more class it as a war memorial and should not be changed to suit the society of today it is part of our history.
attributes.background: Replace the original memorial to Guy Gibson's dog

rejection.details: This is a matter for the RAF, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could contact your local MP and encourage them to lobby the RAF if that's what you'd like to happen.
